runs.comm: down the leg side - I heard a noise and Foster makes a great take to his right. What did that hit? Thigh pad? Well, he's still there
goes for a pull - top-edges it! Who wants it? No one! Falls in no-man's land at square leg
down the leg side, and wided to the cheers of a packed Lord's, with thousands of India fans
what a delivery that is! Angled in on the right-hander before cutting away. Unplayable
that was fast ... but apparently too high, according to the square-leg umpire, and thus it's a wide
clipped firmly off his pads
on his legs, it's pushed to mid-on
smashed to point. Absolutely hammered it, but absolutely to the fielder
outside off and driven back to the bowler
plays and misses to a good, quickish and climbing delivery just outside the off stump
lucky. Very lucky! A thick inside edge flies down to fine leg for four
crashed on the back foot behind square. Mascarenhas, at third man, does well to save four
he's dragged him on! Got him! A little too full to be pulling and he got a thick inside edge
short and fast and he plays and misses. Sidebottom roars to his team-mates, via Raina, "come on, boys". He looks very dangerous and utterly unapproachable in this mood
elegant, classily driven four. Beautiful shot, on the up
this'll be four more! A beautiful flick off his pads through square leg, down the hill, and it absolutely races for four. Poor line from Anderson and India are already flying
chopped down to point
a fast, horrid bouncer which keeps coming at him - and it flies off his gloves. He does not play bouncers at all well, this guy
fended awkwardly through gully - the vacant gully - down to third man
cuts and misses at another shorter ball
nudged to leg
steps outside leg and drives, inside out, to mid-off. Lovely looking shot - and Raina was very nearly run-out at the other end
a bouncer, guided to third man. Well played
got him! A fast bouncer, he goes for a hook and it spirals above the head of Wright, who has to make lots and lots of ground from deep square leg, but he takes it superbly and low to his right
on the off stump, he works it into the deep on the leg side
much shorter - and too short. That's wide. A free run for India there
fuller delivery and driven slightly uppishly, but perfectly safely, just short of cover
flicked to leg
another short delivery, he goes for a clumpingly massive pull but mistimes it - it falls safe in the deep over the leg side. Not altogether in control of that stroke
good, short delivery at 88.9mph. He lets it sail past his nose
another hook shot. Dangerous time this for Jadeja! Really fast delivery
pulled to short midwicket
another mistimed pull, a real flog
low full toss, going for the yorker, Gambhir can't beat mid-on
tight line into the body, cut away to backward point
lovely shot from Gambhir, that's one of his trademarks as he brings out a flowing cover drive which races to the boundary
looks like that might have been the slower ball, comes out as low full toss that Gambhir drives into the covers and Bopara makes a good save
good line again, Jadeja defends square on the off side
goes for the pull, doesn't connect and it loops short of mid-on who is on the edge of the circle
dropped down right by his feet, the ball stays in the crease and they are able to collect a quick single
worked off middle and leg into the on side, Foster chases from behind the stumps to do the fielding
well directed bouncer, Gambhir is early on the shot and is take on the back...the ball loops into the gully area
good pace from Broad, 90.4mph, awkwardly played into the leg side as Jadeja takes one hand off the bat
beats him as he tries to play the upper cut, there is an appeal from the bowler (and the cover fielder) but Steve Davis isn't interested...more good bounce from Broad
banged in back of a length, comes off slower than Gambhir expects again and the batsman is taken on the body this time. The ball lobs to the off side and there's no time for a single
full and driven square through the off side, the cover sweeper can't prevent two
low full toss, worked down to long on
delightful shot from Gambhir, dances down the track and places it over cover with the timing and placement to beat the deep fielders
over the wicket, chopped away to backward point
worked off leg stump just wide of short fine-leg
pushed off middle stump into the leg side, Pietersen chases it down but there's an easy one on offer
almost a wicket first ball, doesn't connect with a pull and it drops just short of Swann at midwicket
well bowled on middle, defended into the off side...good start from Wright
finds the gap this time, that's his best shot so far as he latches on to a pull and bisects the fielders at fine leg and deep square
responds with a good, well directed bouncer aimed at Jadeja's head...the batsman turns away from the ball as he scoots through to Foster
pushed out to backward point...two dot balls after the boundary
worked into the leg side, time for a single but that's a good over to start with from Wright
starts down the leg side, takes the pad to the short fine-leg area
well bowled, beats Gambhir who gives himself room to cut but the bounce does him
driven down to long off
goes back into the crease, pushed through the huge gap at midwicket but it's just a single
goes down to sweep, doesn't connect cleanly but they can still scamper a single to Sidebottom behind square on the leg side
takes the pad again down the leg side, a tidy start from Swann as the required rate climbs
shortish delivery which he guides to point. Good start
pulls it hard but high - a mistimed clobber really - and it lands like a meteor in the midwicket area, dropping dead. Not altogether in control of the stroke
smudged to leg - a shorter ball which he mistimed - and they keep it to one, though Mascarenhas got in his way by mistake
a paddle straight down Stuart Broad's throat at short fine-leg!
that's massive. How on earth do you spend an hour in the dug out, then hit a stroke like that for your first ball? Shot of the day, an elegant loft for six over the top!
slower delivery on his legs
good, straight delivery nudged to leg
down the pitch and lofts it short of long-on
a dart down the leg side!
opens himself up to a stroke out to deep extra cover
skips merrily down the pitch and cracks it to mid-on
a full toss stroked to long-on
opens himself up, driving out to deep extra cover
swings and misses outside off! Not far away at all
good delivery, cutting back into the left-hander who drops it down by his toes. No chance of a run there
fabulous bowling by Broad. The pressure is telling on Jadeja. Pulls it straight into his legs
pulled down to fine leg
chopped down to third man
fuller pull but he nevertheless pulls it through midwicket
another effortless six! Nothing more than a bunt down the ground - for six. Extraordinary strike
full toss - brilliant stop by Collingwood at mid-off to save a single

oh good catch - great catch by Broad at long-on, and it needed someone of his size too! Jadeja timed that flap down the ground really well but Broad is a mountain of a man and reached up high to swallow it
strokes this fuller ball down the ground. Swann holds his nerve, tossing it up
square driven but just for a single

tossed up outside off, beats him in the flight and Foster whips off the bails, and he thinks he's got his man! And replays confirm - Yuvraj's foot wasn't back in time. This is a huge moment in this match!
a swing and a miss to a pitched-up delivery outside off
down the leg side, Dhoni turns it with a flick of the wrists
a mistimed pull - a bit of a welly, as though he was heaving a mattress over a fence - and it falls just short of fine-leg
edged! Just wide of a diving Foster! Great effort
lovely clip - but straight off his toes to short midwicket
drops this out to cover for a quick single
flicked to long-on
oh that's big. That's not big: that's monstrous! A fair old thwack over wide long-on for six!
tries to repeat it but can only get a single
down the leg side to short fine-leg but a poor throw allows them through for a single
a full toss, thrashed flat to deep square leg
tickled down the leg side
full toss, flashed out to the off side. Just a single though
another full toss - he smashes it fine, fine, fine for four! Good god, this is tight
absolutely throws his hands at this and hammers into Collingwood. So hard was it hit, that it bounces off Collingwood and they get two
deft little paddle but well fielded by Sidebottom at short fine-leg
stands tall, slapping to long-off. Not a bad over for England, this. So far, at least. India need a boundary off this last ball
banged out to long-off but they can only get two
smashed - absolutely hammered back into the non-striker's stumps, which prevents four. And three. And they get two
pulled - for four! Poor delivery from Anderson - a slow, meek delivery which sat up and begged to be thrashed. The placement was perfect. It's four
a faster full toss, banged to deep midwicket
slower ball on his legs, clipped for just a single
fullish delivery flogged through midwicket
pulled to fine leg for two
full toss, flogged down to third man
pulled powerfully to leg - in comes the throw from Swann and they'll be run-out here. Dreadful mix-up - but Broad drops it! They're home safely!
full delivery pushed to leg
outside off and he drives this over cover - for four? No. Wright's quick as a flash round the boundary edge
full toss, bashed down to long-off but they still get two
full toss - where's this gone? Sweeps it on the full just wide of short fine leg. Good over for England
good ball, excellent ball - full, almost a yorker, flapped one-handed to long-on. Quick, urgent, adrenaline fuelled fielding
full toss, but he mistimes this flog to the leg-side
terrific ball! Well bowled indeed! That's brilliant - another off-stump yorker. Sidebottom is all over India here. Pushed out to the off side and India's fans are silent
he's done it - a six! A one-handed six over the top! The match is alive. What a blow that is. Don't go anywhere - do not leave your seats
stroked to long-on - England are all but through. Nearly...
flogged through midwicket but only for a four - and England have done it! India are out of the competition, dumped out before the semi-finals!
